ygData.subject: RE: Time for a new weapon
ygData.msgSnippet: the one day i went to try for a Kilij (was bored and the quest was just patched in, i did not need one) i walked into South Ro and the first giant i killed had
ygData.messageBody:
the one day i went to try for a Kilij (was bored and the quest was just
patched in, i did not need one) i walked into South Ro and the first giant i
killed had the plans. i brought a level 40 bard along with me, and let him
have it since it would be an improvement on his weapons. i stayed (was
bored remember hehe) and killed a half dozen or so more giants and got
nothing. actually i did this the next day (bored again) and killed another
half dozen or so and nothing. got really lucky that first time.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L31 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server


> p.s. some guy said he got one in 2 hours of camp time. also
> when you are
> there look out for the Ancient Cyclops - if you have helpers
> that would a be
> a very rare spawn and he has jbootie stuff - I think??
